title: Art to the people
brief_description: Shows the work of the process engravers and the printers who produce each year the calendar of reproductions of wining entries in the Dunlop Art Contest. The film illustrates all stages in the production of the calendar from the photographing of the original material by the process engraver to the final wrapping of the printed article. The film also illustrates the opportunities for apprenticeship in the printing industry.
